futureEvents.title: Workers Appreciation Event

location.name: Wingate by Wyndham Round Rock Hotel

futureEvents.description: Join us to celebrate and appreciate our amazing team for their hard work and dedication throughout the year. This special evening will include a delicious dinner, engaging activities, and heartfelt acknowledgments of everyone's contributions.

futureEvents.title: Ignite Austin
futureEvents.description: Experience a night of electrifying music, fun-filled activities, and connection at Ignite Austin. This event brings together vibrant communities to celebrate creativity, passion, and unity in the heart of the city.

futureEvents.title: Jazz Night
futureEvents.description: Unwind and enjoy an evening of smooth jazz and live performances. Jazz Night promises a sophisticated atmosphere, exquisite tunes, and a chance to connect with fellow music lovers in a relaxed setting.

pastEvents.title: Sit-Down Lunch with Pastor
pastEvents.description: A personal and informal gathering where attendees shared a meal with the pastor, asked questions, and engaged in meaningful discussions about faith and community.

pastEvents.title: Evangelism Month
pastEvents.description: Throughout October 2024, we focused on spreading the gospel through outreach programs, community service, and spiritual engagements across Austin. Each week brought new opportunities to share the love of Christ.

pastEvents.title: Arise Austin
pastEvents.description: An evening of powerful worship, prayer, and a transformative message to ignite faith and action within the Austin community.

pastEvents.title: Church Building Dedication
pastEvents.description: A historic moment for our community as we dedicate the new church building. Join us for a spirit-filled service, ribbon-cutting ceremony, and a tour of the new facility.

pastEvents.title: Watch Night Service
pastEvents.description: Ring in the New Year with prayer, worship, and reflection. Join us as we thank God for the past year and look forward to His blessings in the new one.

pastEvents.title: Christmas Choir Concert
pastEvents.description: Celebrate the season with a beautiful evening of carols and performances by our talented church choir.

pastEvents.title: Thanksgiving Service
pastEvents.description: A heartfelt service of gratitude and praise as we reflect on God's blessings over the past year.

pastEvents.title: Harvest Festival
pastEvents.description: An evening of family-friendly games, food, and fun celebrating the fall season with our community.

pastEvents.title: Back-to-School Prayer Night
pastEvents.description: A special evening dedicated to praying for students, teachers, and parents as they prepare for the new school year.

pastEvents.title: Mission Trip Fundraiser Dinner
pastEvents.description: Support our upcoming mission trip by joining us for a delicious dinner, silent auction, and updates on our mission efforts.

pastEvents.title: Church Picnic
pastEvents.description: A day of fun, fellowship, and outdoor activities for the entire family. Bring your favorite dish to share!

pastEvents.title: Father's Day Breakfast
pastEvents.description: Celebrate fathers with a hearty breakfast and special messages honoring their roles in our families and community.

pastEvents.title: Vacation Bible School
pastEvents.description: A week of fun, learning, and spiritual growth for children as they engage in Bible lessons, crafts, and songs.

pastEvents.title: Youth Worship Night
pastEvents.description: A night dedicated to youth-led worship, testimonies, and spiritual empowerment for young believers.

pastEvents.title: Easter Sunday Service
pastEvents.description: Celebrate the resurrection of Jesus Christ with a vibrant service featuring worship, a powerful sermon, and fellowship.

pastEvents.title: Marriage Enrichment Seminar
pastEvents.description: Strengthen your relationship through biblical teachings, practical advice, and interactive sessions designed for couples.

pastEvents.title: Community Health Fair
pastEvents.description: Join us for free health check-ups, wellness workshops, and fitness sessions. Empowering our community to lead healthier lives in body and spirit.

pastEvents.title: Revival Week
pastEvents.description: A week of powerful worship, inspiring sermons, and life-changing prayer sessions aimed at spiritual renewal and community revival.
